1.content: Are you a human, an anthro, or a pokemon
1.title: Who/What are you

111.content:
So...here's the first boy,Jake.

Jake is a pretty calm and cool guy,sorta silly too,but gets serious when the time calls.He has tan skin,an average body for a male,blue eyes,and black rebel style hair.He loves to wear a black and blue stripped hoodie,and gray pants with a diamond stitch on the left leg.He is 5'11" and 14 years old.He travels with his best (Pokemon) friend,Marla.

Marla is an anthropomorphic Whimsicott.Jake saved her from one of mom experiments,but by the time she did,she already possessed human traits...along with a Swalot trait,so she can be able to eat just about anything and not get a stomachache.She has C-cup breasts (for her size),a slim waist line,and large hips.She also has three round fingers on her stubby arms.

So...wanna go as Jake...
111.title: Jake...

15.content: So, what'll it be? Surely you know by now...
15.title: What pokemon are you?

info.brief_description: The world of pokemon, only there's vore involved!
info.description:
This is the story of where you can be a human, pokemon, or something inbetween (anthro i think). In this story, you choose what to do. You can vore, you can unbirth, you can fu** them. The only thing not allowed is gay interaction.

Please at least try to get the spelling correct and have no grammar mistakes. I hate when I see a story that's like that. AND NO SHORT CHAPTERS. AT LEAST A PARAGRAPH
